title: The Sopranos television series logo
content:
I’ve done some research on the web and was unable to find out who designed the classic [The Sopranos](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122122140/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Sopranos) [logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122122140/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Image:Sopranosposters2.jpg) with the handgun substituting for the ’r’.

Can anybody help me with this? Thanks.

 [‹ Can I put a script font on a curved baseline?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122122140/http:/www.typophile.com/node/48194 "Go to previous forum topic") [Now no one can complain... ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122122140/http:/www.typophile.com/node/48093 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Bald Condensed

comments.content:

Might you know The Secret of Life and The Universe perchance? :^P
